inputs.description: Write output into dataset with prefix 'ppp'. [default='cmplx']
inputs.name: PREFIX

inputs.description: The 2 inputs are real and imaginary parts. [this is the default]
inputs.name: RI

inputs.description: The 2 inputs are magnitude and phase. [phase is in radians, please!]
inputs.name: MP

inputs.description: Only output nonzero values where the mask dataset 'mset' is nonzero. Notes: * Input datasets must be byte-, short-, or float-valued. * You might calculate the component datasets using 3dcalc. * At present, there is limited support for complex datasets. About the only thing you can do is display them in 2D slice windows in AFNI.  -- RWCox - March 2006  ++ Compile date = Sep  7 2018 {:}
inputs.name: MASK
